verses.verse: And he said <S%H559><s%> unto me <S%H1121><s%>, Son of man <S%H120><s%>, stand <S%H5975><s%> upon thy feet <S%H7272><s%>, and I will speak with thee <S%H1696><s%>.

And the Spirit <S%H7307><s%> entered <S%H935><s%> into me when he spake <S%H1696><s%> unto me <S%H5975><s%>, and set me upon my feet <S%H7272><s%>; and I heard <S%H8085><s%> him that spake unto me <S%H1696><s%>.

And he said <S%H559><s%> unto me <S%H1121><s%>, Son of man <S%H120><s%>, I send <S%H7971><s%> thee to the children <S%H1121><s%> of Israel <S%H3478><s%>, to nations <S%H1471><s%> that are rebellious <S%H4775><s%>, which have rebelled <S%H4775><s%> against me <S%H1><s%>: they and their fathers have transgressed <S%H6586><s%> against me even unto this very <S%H6106><s%> day <S%H3117><s%>.

And the children <S%H1121><s%> are impudent <S%H7186><s%> and stiffhearted <S%H2389><s%>: I do send <S%H7971><s%> thee unto them <S%H559><s%>; and thou shalt say unto them <S%H559><s%>, Thus saith the Lord <S%H136><s%> Jehovah <S%H3069><s%>.

And they <S%H8085><s%>, whether they will hear, or whether they will forbear <S%H2308><s%>, (for they are a rebellious <S%H4805><s%> house <S%H1004><s%>,) yet shall know <S%H3045><s%> that there hath been a prophet <S%H5030><s%> among them <S%H8432><s%>.

And thou <S%H1121><s%>, son of man <S%H120><s%>, be not afraid <S%H3372><s%> of them <S%H3372><s%>, neither be afraid of their words <S%H1697><s%>, though briers <S%H5621><s%> and thorns <S%H5544><s%> are with thee <S%H3427><s%>, and thou dost dwell among scorpions <S%H6137><s%>: be not afraid <S%H3372><s%> of their words <S%H1697><s%>, nor be dismayed <S%H2865><s%> at their looks <S%H6440><s%>, though they are a rebellious <S%H4805><s%> house <S%H1004><s%>.
And thou shalt speak <S%H1696><s%> my words <S%H1697><s%> unto them <S%H8085><s%>, whether they will hear, or whether they will forbear <S%H2308><s%>; for they are most rebellious <S%H4805><s%>.

But thou <S%H1121><s%>, son of man <S%H120><s%>, hear <S%H8085><s%> what I say <S%H1696><s%> unto thee <S%H1961><s%>; be not thou rebellious <S%H4805><s%> like that rebellious <S%H4805><s%> house <S%H1004><s%>: open <S%H6475><s%> thy mouth <S%H6310><s%>, and eat <S%H398><s%> that which I give thee <S%H5414><s%>.
And when I looked <S%H7200><s%>, behold <S%H3027><s%>, a hand was put <S%H7971><s%> forth unto me <S%H4039><s%>; and, lo, a roll of a book was therein <S%H5612><s%>;

And he spread <S%H6566><s%> it before <S%H6440><s%> me <S%H3789><s%>: and it was written within <S%H6440><s%> and without <S%H268><s%>; and there were written <S%H3789><s%> therein lamentations <S%H7015><s%>, and mourning <S%H1899><s%>, and woe <S%H1958><s%>.
